dct_title_s: Ad antiquam Indiæ geographiam tabula : auctor d'Anville
dct_description_sm: Cartographic Details: Scale [1:11,000,000]. Inset map:"Ptolemaicæ tabulæ (in parte maritima) brevis imago." Numbered 33. Shows rivers and settlements. Published by Harrison as part of an apparently untitled general atlas. Relief shown pictorially. Ferro meridian. Dimensions: 43 x 38 centimeters
